RELIGION

Selva Vinayagar Temple: Sankatahara Chathurthi puja, Railway Colony, 6.30 p.m.

Saiva Siddantha Sabai: 59{+t}{+h}anniversary celebrations, seminar on ‘Women empowerment’, Prof. Gnanapoongothai, South Adi Street, Meenakshi Temple, 9 a.m.

Panniru Tirumurai Mandram: Pannisai, Adi Streets, Meenakshi Sundareswarar Temple, 7 a.m.’

Arsha Parampara: Discourse on ‘Lalitha Sahasranamam’ and spiritual heritage class by Swamini Vidyananda Saraswathi, Old Kalyana Mandapam, Meenakshi Sundareswarar Temple, 10 a.m.; on ‘Mundakopanishad’, Sudhara, Andalpuram, 6.30 p.m.

Sri Madanagopala Swami Temple: Discourse on ‘Sri Mahabharatam’ by V.Govindaraja Battachariyar, West Masi Street, 7 p.m.

Sri Aurobindo Study Forum: Discourse on ‘Sri Aurobindo’s Life Divine,’ by Subramany, Nithyatha, Auro Lab, Veerapanchan, 10 a.m.

Swami Tatwananda Ashram: Samananda conducts ‘Mandukya Upanishad’ class, Swami Tatwananda Ashram, P and T Nagar, 6.45 p.m.

Church of Christ: Sunday service, Deva Manickam delivers message, Gnanaolivupuram, 10 a.m. and 6 p.m.

Our Lady of Lourdes Church: Sunday prayer, K. Pudur, 8 a.m.

CULTURE

Gita Bhavanam: 117{+t}{+h}jayanthi celebrations, Geetha Bhavanam Lane, Kamarajar Salai, 6 p.m.

Puratchi Kavingnar Mandram: Discourse on ‘Unave Marunthu’ by R. Illankumaran and Dr. Jagannathan, Maniammai Elementary School campus, North Masi Street, 5 p.m.

International Sivananda Yoga Vedanta Centre: Yoga and meditation classes, 444 KK Nagar East Ninth Street, 6 a.m., 6.30 p.m., and 10 a.m. and 4 p.m. (for women).

Prajapita Brahmakumaris Ishwariya Vishwa Vidyalaya: Free rajayoga meditation classes; 36 Meenakshi Nagar, P and T Nagar, 40 Sambandamoorthy Street, 47 B CMR Road and 357 Anna Nagar, 6.30 a.m. and 5.30 p.m.

Universal Peace Sanctuary: Sundaramoorthi Sachidananda conducts free meditation class, 138 Kamarajar Salai, 7 p.m.

Arulgnana Sabai: 193{+r}{+d}meeting, Dr. S. Neelakandan speaks on ‘Vadaloor Vazhi’, Thiagarajar College of Engineering, 6.30 p.m.

GENERAL

Madurai District Jankalyan Trust: Mupperum vizha, Ananda T. Amirtham, president, Jankalyan, S. Sankaralingam, former Chief Commissioner Income Tax, S. Mohan Gandhi, vice-president, Jankalyan, Dr. C. E. Suriyamoorthi of MKU address, Vasudara Complex, Andalpuram, 10 a.m.

Vidiyal: Mentors’ meet, Rathinapuram, 11 a.m.

Hemophilia Society (Madurai Chapter): Counselling session, UC Higher Secondary School campus, Periyar bus stand, 11 a.m.

Junior Chamber, Madurai Central: Effective public speaking by JCI National Trainer M. Chandrachoodeshwaran, A. Goutham inaugurates, 9.30 a.m.; valedictory function, G. Muhil addresses, Hotel Arasan Sapthagiri, 4.30 p.m.

Madurai Sivakasi Nadars Pioneer Meenakshi Women’s College: NSS camp, Poovanthi, 9.30 a.m.

MSS Wakf Board College: NSS camp, Odaipatti, 9.30 a.m.

Yadava College: NSS camp, Alagarkoil, 7 a.m.

Subitcham: Monthly meeting of parents/guardians on maintenance of mentally ill children at home, Ramiah Street, Shenoy Nagar, 10.30 a.m.

Innovative Trade Fairs: Constructive 2016 national exhibition of building and construction materials, Tamukkum Grounds, 10 a.m.

Alcoholics Anonymous: Meeting, UC Higher Secondary School, 11 a.m.; RC School, Sivaganga Road, Melur, 6.30 p.m.; Justice V.R. Krishna Iyer Community Hall, Lake View Road, K.K. Nagar and Railway Institute, 7 p.m.
